channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Spiffy Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Spiffy Calendar

item.title: CVE-2024-0855|2024-02-27T08:30:29.193Z -- Unknown -- Spiffy Calendar
item.description: The Spiffy Calendar WordPress plugin before 4.9.9 doesn't check the event_author parameter, and allows any user to alter it when creating an event, leading to deceiving users/admins that a page was created by a Contributor+.
